name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Support Engineer with a robust background in SaaS and customer support, leveraging 8 years of full stack development experience to enhance technical support and service excellence. Proficient in utilizing **SQL** for data querying and management, ensuring comprehensive troubleshooting and efficient resolution of client issues. Adept at using support tools such as **Zendesk**, **Linear**, and **JIRA** to track inquiries and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction. My technical acumen includes integrating analytics solutions with **Metabase** to derive actionable insights and improve user experiences.

I possess exceptional problem-solving skills and a strong emphasis on communication, essential for providing effective support in fast-paced environments. My extensive experience using **SendingGrid** for transactional email management ensures seamless client interaction. With a proven track record of collaborating across teams, I am committed to resolving user challenges while also contributing to the continuous improvement of support processes.
